subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: My father had been emotionally boycotting the Yankees since Dec. 14, 1948. That was the day they had traded his favorite player, Steve Souchock, to the White Sox.
snippet: My father had been emotionally boycotting the Yankees since Dec. 14, 1948. That was the day they had traded his favorite player, Steve Souchock, to the White Sox.
